transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello. Haan ji. Kanhaiya ji.
Executive: Ji bataiye Virendra baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Achcha namaste sir, Avnish baat kar raha hu sir.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji bataiye sir aap kaise hain sir?
Customer: Bahut badhiya ji.
Executive: Are wo services regarding tha na to wo issue tha. Abhi kya tha sara kuch ho chuka hai. Jo service activate honi thi wo ek shuru kal ke date mein host ho jayegi. Kal subah subah tak. To abhi jo leads aa rahi thi abhi aapke basic ki matlab jaise pehle bhi aa rahe the wahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kal ke date mein haan ye sir ne bhi bataya mujhe. Mujhe laga tha host ho gayi service. Itna jankari nahi tha. Fir abhi Kanhaiya ji ka call aaya fir abhi dekha main check kar liya fir team se baat kara discussion mein ye hua ki kal ke date mein inki service subah mein morning mein host ho jayegi. Wo jo naya package hai apna star supplier ka uske liye.
Customer: Achcha thik hai ji.
Executive: Haan leads, inquiries, calls jo hongi sab usi tarike se reflect honi shuru hongi fir sir kal se.
Customer: Nahi to isme wo catalog to thik karwaiye isko.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Catalog mein 1 HP 2 HP ke jo hum hamare item aa rahe hain inko delete karwaiye waha se. Kyunki hum usme deal karte nahi hain.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Apna to jitna bhi hai 10 se 15 horsepower se basic ki jitni bhi machine hai wahi hai na apne paas to.
Customer: Haan haan haan ji.
Executive: Wo catalog se hatna chahiye kyunki wo unhi ki valid humko dikhati hai baar baar wo.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Wo catalog catalog aapka redesign ho gaya hai. Thik hai ek bari aap check karenge na to jo catalog mein aapke paanch paanch horsepower aur teen char horsepower ki require information dali hui thi wo sari information hat gayi hai ab.
Customer: Achcha thik hai. Achcha thik hai.
Executive: Haan wo ab jo bhi hai motor power ko 15 horsepower se kam koi nahi dala hua hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Kal jab service host ho jayegi to fir ek us department ka ek naya account manager aapko assign hoga. Abhi filhal ke liye mere hi paas case hai. Jab unke paas case chala jayega na sir to wo apne tarike se apne department ko kis tarike se wo log design karke rakhte hain wo unke upar fir rehta hai. Fir wo sahi sari cheezein sahi haan jo bhi fir kamiya kami beshi hogi catalog design ho chuka hai aapka jo jo bhi kami beshi hogi na fir wo us tarike se sahi karenge jo aap unko guide karenge.
Customer: Achcha chalo wo to ye to ye ho gaya. Dusra ye maine aapko ek personally kaha tha ki koi ek banda hume de dijiyega jo ye hai na wo thoda sa iske liye bhi main aapko personally baat karna chah raha hu. To usme agar kuch ho sakta ho koi banda.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Main koi agar aisa banda mujhe milega Aligarh apne matlab apne area ke liye Rafatpur side ka.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aligarh side ka to main ek baar usse connect kar aata hu aap se. Thik hai aaj kal mein main aap se connect kara dunga.
Customer: Kyunki kyunki Kanhaiya ke level se hi upar ka masla hai wo Kanhaiya nahi kar pa rahe isko.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Ek employee rakhi the rakhe hue the na aap ek lady thi shayad koi.
Customer: Haan wo bhi nahi kar payi.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Unhone to abhi service ko jaana hi nahi tha kuch.
Customer: Haan bilkul wahi cheez hai.
Customer: To proper agar banda hume koi mil jaye. Hame salary ka hume koi issue nahi hai. Hai na kyunki hamare product aise hain agar hum salary 30000 bhi de denge na to bhi hamare liye koi usme dikkat wali baat nahi hai. But wo kaam to nikal payega.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Bilkul. To aisa banda mere ko.
Executive: Service ko aapke aapke service ko sahi tarike se handle karne wala banda hona chahiye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Service handle nahi sahi se ho payegi to fir uska kuch fruitful result nahi milega sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi result nahi aayega utna hum piche minus mein jayenge. Ab wo maan lo bande ne hume pure mahine mein agar ek customer bhi pakdaya to hamare liye no problem. 30000 hum usko de sakte hain. Agar do customer de deta hai to main usko 40000 bhi de dunga. Ji. Teen customer agar mere ko wo de pata hai to main 50000 bhi salary usko de dunga. Samasya usme nahi hai koi bhi.
Executive: Ji agar aisa koi employee mujhe aapke area ka agar kyunki haan milta hai to main aapko jarur batata hu. Thik hai.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai okay okay.
Customer: Chaliye aur Kanhaiya Kanhaiya ji kaha hain?
Customer: Kanhaiya ji factory par hi hain aisa hai Kanhaiya ji karte rahenge uske sath mein karte rahenge bande ke sath mein. Hai na lekin akele Kanhaiya ji ke liye thoda sa mushkil hai.
Executive: Ji ji nahi wo to maine bhi bataya tha aapko starting mein hi jab apna discussion hua tha Diwali ke baad us time bataya tha maine.
Customer: Bataya tha aapne mujhe ji.
Executive: Ji abhi jo apna catalog hai na wo us pe TrustSeal ka sab kuch certification ho gaya hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai achcha hai ji.
Executive: Haan aapko uska format main bhej deta hu aapke WhatsApp pe hi.
Customer: Haan haan haan wo dijiyega TrustSeal ka ek office mein bhi lagana hota hai na.
Executive: Wo yaha se haan wo yaha se deliver hoga sir aapke address pe hi courier kar diya jayega.
Customer: Achcha achcha thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Ji haan.
Customer: Thik hai achcha address pe hi courier ho jayega to wo physical usko badhiya se binding kara karke hi present karenge aap se.
Customer: Haan haan haan bilkul ji bilkul.
Executive: Ji to mere ko bas aap thoda sa yaha koi banda jarur mere liye dekh lijiyega.
Executive: Main main dekhta hu salary ka koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Hai na.
Executive: Kanhaiya chalte rahenge unke sath mein koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Main main aapko bata dunga jaisa hi jaise hi koi mujhe matlab aisa dedicated employee type ka milta hai na.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Dusra ye bhi koi issue nahi hai ki wo mere yaha reh ke hi kaam kare.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan wo on site jaha par bhi hai uska but hume kya usne kiya pure din ka call recording bhi de denge na to baat samajh mein aayegi ki haan inhone kaam kiya hai.
Executive: Kaam kiya hai. Bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Bhai usi se judgement ho jayega. Dusra result aayega to bhi judgement ho jayega.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hai na. Teesra buyleads consume kitni ki hai waha se bhi judge ho jayega ki haan ye kaam kar rahe hain. To judge karne ke to bahut sare iske tarike hain. Hamare paas baith ke hi kaam karna koi uska wo nahi hai isme. Hai na to dekhiyega aap mere liye koi agar banda agar kar paate hain aap apne paas ka hi dekh lijiyega koi samasya usme nahi hai. Aligarh ka milta hai bahut behtar hai.
Executive: Ji main dekhta hu ek do dost hain mere Aligarh side ke main ek baar connect karke unse dekhta hu agar koi aisa banda hai to main aapko aapki baat karata hu unse. Thik hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji okay ji.
Executive: Okay okay. Thank you sir.
Customer: Whatsapp check kariyega maine bhej diya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants catalog to be fixed.

- Wants an employee for his area.



Resolution:

- Catalog has been redesigned.

- Executive assured to find a dedicated employee.

- TrustSeal certification done, format will be shared.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, trustseal, employee, service
